digest_items.title: Review firewall rules
digest_items.why: Overly permissive firewall rules expose unnecessary services
digest_items.fix: Apply principle of least privilege and close unused ports

digest_items.title: Implement security monitoring
digest_items.why: Real-time monitoring detects attacks and anomalies early
digest_items.fix: Use SIEM tools and set up alerts for suspicious activities

digest_items.title: Scan for exposed secrets in repos
digest_items.why: Committed secrets can be found by attackers scanning public repositories
digest_items.fix: Use tools like git-secrets or truffleHog to scan commit history

digest_items.title: Implement data classification
digest_items.why: Classification ensures appropriate security controls for sensitive data
digest_items.fix: Label data as public, internal, confidential, or restricted

digest_items.title: Implement session timeout
digest_items.why: Long-lived sessions increase risk of session hijacking
digest_items.fix: Set session timeout to 15-30 minutes for sensitive applications
